sentences.en: "Gimme a break, kid! You know how much those things cost?"
sentences.cn: “饶了我吧，小祖宗！你知道这些东西有多贵吗？”

sentences.en: “No one would have dared to break into his abstraction”(&b{Alan Paton})
sentences.cn: “没有人胆敢打断他的臆想”(&b{艾伦·佩顿})

sentences.en: a prowler who was trying to break in.
sentences.cn: 企图非法闯入的小偷

sentences.en: A sudden break in the cloud allowed rescuers to spot Michael Benson.
sentences.cn: 天气的突然放晴帮助救援人员找到了迈克尔·本森。

sentences.en: An impromptu visit broke up the long afternoon.
sentences.cn: 突然的造访打破了漫长的午后时光

sentences.en: break down a partition; broke down our resolve.
sentences.cn: 捣毁一堵隔墙；丧失了我们的决心

sentences.en: break in new shoes.
sentences.cn: 把一双新鞋穿得合脚

sentences.en: Break out the rifles!
sentences.cn: 准备好来福枪！

sentences.en: break up a chocolate bar.
sentences.cn: 把一块长条巧克力弄碎

sentences.en: broke down and bought a new car; prejudices that break down slowly.
sentences.cn: 不再坚持，买了一辆新的小轿车；慢慢放弃了的偏见

sentences.en: broke into broadcast journalism at an early age.
sentences.cn: 早年就进入了广播新闻界

sentences.en: Clearly, the police cannot break the law in order to enforce it.
sentences.cn: 显然，警方不能为了执法而犯法。

sentences.en: Dawn was breaking by the time we arrived home.
sentences.cn: 我们到家的时候天蒙蒙亮。

sentences.en: Family holidays are meant to be a break from routine.
sentences.cn: 家庭假日就是从平淡的日常生活中解脱一下。

sentences.en: Fighting broke out in the prison cells.
sentences.cn: 牢房里发生斗殴

sentences.en: Guards broke up the fight. The marriage broke up.
sentences.cn: 警卫们结束了这场打斗。婚姻破裂了

sentences.en: He charged into the crowd. "Break it up," he shouted.
sentences.cn: 他冲进人群，大喊道：“散开。”

sentences.en: He fell through the window, breaking the glass.
sentences.cn: 他打破玻璃，从窗口摔了出去。

sentences.en: I didn't mean to break his nose. I just saw red.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意要打断他的鼻梁。我只是一时气急。

sentences.en: I feel as if I should break into song.
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己应该放声歌唱。

sentences.en: I had to break a window to get into the house.
sentences.cn: 我只得打破一扇窗户进屋。

sentences.en: I locked myself out of our apartment and had to break in.
sentences.cn: 我把自己锁在了我们的公寓外面，不得不破门而入。

sentences.en: I never break my promises .
sentences.cn: 我从不食言。

sentences.en: I’ll go shopping during my lunch break .
sentences.cn: 我在午休时间去买点东西。

sentences.en: If you break the rules , you will be punished.
sentences.cn: 违反规定要受到惩罚。

sentences.en: It was feared they could break the Allies' codes.
sentences.cn: 恐怕他们会破译盟军的密码。

sentences.en: Let's break out the champagne.
sentences.cn: 我们开一瓶香槟吧

sentences.en: Let’s take a ten-minute break .
sentences.cn: 我们休息十分钟吧。

sentences.en: Many struggling firms are ready to break the law by dodging tax.
sentences.cn: 很多挣扎求生的企业不惜违法逃税。

sentences.en: Mr Annan took a short break before resuming his schedule.
sentences.cn: 安南先生在继续自己的工作前先短暂休息了一下。

sentences.en: New talks will begin on Monday in an effort to break the deadlock .
sentences.cn: 为打破僵局，星期一将重启会谈。

sentences.en: Opposition to the king's rule gradually broke down his authority.
sentences.cn: 对国王统治的反抗逐渐削弱了他的权威

sentences.en: She wanted to make a clean break from her mother and father.
sentences.cn: 她想和父母一刀两断。

sentences.en: The band continued with their set after a short break.
sentences.cn: 短暂的休息后，乐队继续演奏他们的曲目。

sentences.en: The cameras catch motorists who break the speed limit.
sentences.cn: 摄像头会拍下超速的司机。

sentences.en: The crowd broke up after the game.
sentences.cn: 比赛结束后人群四面散开

sentences.en: The elevator broke down.
sentences.cn: 电梯出毛病了

sentences.en: The horse broke into a wild gallop. The child broke into a flood of tears.
sentences.cn: 那匹马开始狂奔。那个孩子突然放声大哭

sentences.en: The newspapers and television can make or break you.
sentences.cn: 报纸和电视会使你成功，也会将你毁掉。

sentences.en: The oil is attacked by naturally occurring microbes which break it down.
sentences.cn: 原油受到了自然产生的分解油类物质的微生物的侵蚀。

sentences.en: The population breaks down into three main groups.
sentences.cn: 人口可分成三个主要的群族

sentences.en: The silence was broken by a loud scream.
sentences.cn: 一声尖叫打破了寂静。

sentences.en: Their teeth are sharp enough to break the skin.
sentences.cn: 它们牙齿锋利，足以咬破皮肤。

sentences.en: They broke for lunch.
sentences.cn: 他们停下来吃午饭。

sentences.en: They’re breaking the law by employing such young children.
sentences.cn: 他们雇用这么小的孩子是违法的。

sentences.en: We need to break the cycle of poverty and crime in the inner cities.
sentences.cn: 我们需要打破旧城区里贫困和犯罪的恶性循环。

sentences.en: We took turns driving, in order to try and break the monotony.
sentences.cn: 我们轮流开车，免得乏味。

sentences.en: we've broken the back of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们已经解决了这个问题的最困难的部分。

sentences.en: we've broken the back of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们已经解决了这个问题的最困难的部分。

sentences.en: we've broken the back of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们已经解决了这个问题的最困难的部分。

sentences.en: we've broken the back of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们已经解决了这个问题的最困难的部分。

sentences.en: We’d worked for ten hours without a break .
sentences.cn: 我们已经连续工作十小时了。

sentences.en: We’ll have a short break for lunch, then start again at two o'clock.
sentences.cn: 我们稍微休息一下吃午饭，两点钟再开始。

sentences.en: You betrayed me. You broke your word .
sentences.cn: 你出卖了我，你说话不算数。

words.tran_cn: 易碎的东西，易破的东西
折断；打碎；损坏（break的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 分隔：从大量数据中把（信息）离析出来
完成某项任务中最困难的部分
突破，穿过：冲破障碍突然、迅速地前进
【非正式用语】 爆发出大笑，使…爆发出大笑
v. 结束；与…绝交，和…断绝关系；和…决裂
断裂伸长；断裂延伸率；破坏时伸长量

trans.tran_cn: 休息，间歇，暂停，短期休假，缝隙，机遇，破裂，骨折，接连击中
trans.tran_en: a period of time when you stop working in order to rest, eat etc

trans.tran_cn: 破碎，弄坏，坏掉，弄破，违犯，中断，开拓，削弱，突变，散开，开始，公布，打破（记录），拍岸，破解
破， 断裂； 破晓； 转晴
trans.tran_en: when the day or the  dawn  breaks, the sky gets light
to not do something that you have promised to do or signed an agreement to do
